extendedIngredients.name: mango powder
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ tsp dry pomegranate seeds or ½ tsp dry mango powder

extendedIngredients.name: multi grain bread
extendedIngredients.originalString: 5-6 slices of white bread or brown bread or multi grain bread

extendedIngredients.name: red pepper powder
extendedIngredients.originalString: ½ tsp crushed black pepper or ¼ tsp black pepper powder

recipes.title: bread rolls with stuffed potatoes, how to make bread rolls
recipes.instructions: boil the potatoes.when they are still warm, peel and mash them and keep aside.crush the dry pomegranate seeds to a powder in a mortar-pestle.add the pomengranate powder, crushed black pepper, red chili powder, chopped green chilies, coriander leaves, garam masala powder, cumin powder and chaat masala powder and salt.mix the whole filling well.make small to medium rolls of the filling depending on the size of the bread and how many you are going to use.taste and add more salt or spice powders if required.take a slice of bread and dampen it with water,squeeze the water from the bread.place the filling in the center of the bread.roll the bread and close the edges so as to get an even outer cover.make all bread rolls this way and keep aside.heat oil in a kadai or vok.fry the bread rolls till they become crisp and golden in color.drain the bread rolls on kitchen paper tissues to remove excess oil.serve the bread rolls with tomato sauce or green chutney.

steps.step: boil the potatoes.when they are still warm, peel and mash them and keep aside.crush the dry pomegranate seeds to a powder in a mortar-pestle.add the pomengranate powder, crushed black pepper, red chili powder, chopped green chilies, coriander leaves, garam masala powder, cumin powder and chaat masala powder and salt.mix the whole filling well.make small to medium rolls of the filling depending on the size of the bread and how many you are going to use.taste and add more salt or spice powders if required.take a slice of bread and dampen it with water,squeeze the water from the bread.place the filling in the center of the bread.roll the bread and close the edges so as to get an even outer cover.make all bread rolls this way and keep aside.heat oil in a kadai or vok.fry the bread rolls till they become crisp and golden in color.drain the bread rolls on kitchen paper tissues to remove excess oil.serve the bread rolls with tomato sauce or green chutney.
